item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Mario and I am 20 years old. I am a student of the higher degree of Web Application Development at the CPIFP Los Enlaces, Zaragoza. Prior to this, I studied Multiplatform Application Development at the Satiago Hernandez institute, just after finishing high school at the same center. Now, my goal is to finish the Web, so I can start working, preferably on something related to web pages, which is what I like the most of everything I’ve studied so far.

item.title: About Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a framework for creating web pages. One of the most popular in the creation of static sites. Installation on Linux # The command-based installation in linux is simple, you just have to follow the steps. Facility Install snap to download hugo sudo apt-get install snap Install hugo sudo snap install hugo –classic Install an editor (for example VisualStudioCode) sudo snap install code –classic Page creation hugo new site “example” Installation on Windows # Installation on windows is somewhat more complicated.

item.title: Comunication
item.description: First Step # The address that is typed into the browser’s search bar. This address is made up of: Protocol Authority Port Route Parameters Fragment https: //user:password@links.com :80 /modules/dwes ?id=123&search=php #objects-111 Second Step # The address that we have entered is evaluated by the DNS server, which is in charge of looking for an IP that corresponds to the web page that is being searched for. Third Step # The router is responsible for requesting the information found on the Internet, to send it later to the computers that are requesting it.

item.title: Tools
item.description: WebPack It is a JavaScript module wrapper that manages the dependency between modules, compresses the code and requests files. https://webpack.js.org/ Polyfill It is a piece of code, used in the web with JavaScript, which is used to provide modern functionality to older browsers that do not support it by default. PHP It is an open source programming language, used especially for web development https://www.php.net/ Django It is a high-level framework used for the development of websites.
